title: Copy the Google Drive CMS template to your Google Drive
deck:
This template provides the Apps Scripts and basic structure to publish content to your URL endpoint.

Either Add to Drive (button below!) from this site, or make a copy of a pre-existing Google Drive CMS template in your Drive.
caption: Add the Google Drive CMS template to your Google Drive

title: Create headers for your content
deck:
Each header you add to the CMS sheet within your new Spreadsheet will be a key sent to your endpoint as JSON.
Think of these headers like field names in a database, or keys in an object.

For example, a Spreadsheet that looks like this:

NameEmail

Will create JSON that looks like this:

title: Add an endpoint to the settings
deck: Open the sheet on the Spreadsheet called Settings and edit the endpoint value to the URL you want the Spreadsheet's content sent to.
extra:
mode_editEdit the endpoint of the template I just created

info_outlineNote! You need to wire-up how your chosen endpoint handles the sent data. Google Drive CMS is unopinionated in this regard.
